alert.note: Alert for Chase; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 07 at 7:44PM CDT until June 08 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM MDT/1045 PM CDT/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Nebraska, including the following counties, Chase, Frontier, Hayes, Lincoln and Perkins. * WHEN...Until 945 PM MDT /1045 PM CDT/. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 644 PM MDT /744 PM CDT/, the public reported heavy rain in Imperial due to thunderstorms. This is causing urban and small stream flooding. Up to 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Imperial is the most likely place to experience minor flooding. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Imperial, Curtis, Hayes Center, Wauneta, Eustis, Wellfleet, Moorefield, Stockville, Medicine Creek Reservoir, Enders, Enders Reservoir, Maywood, Hamlet, Marengo, Quick, Bluegill Haven Campground, Willow View Campground. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
